title: Tribe near a deal with Perez
subtitle: Tribe near a deal with Perez
body: CLEVELAND -- Eduardo Perez will be paying a visit to Jacobs Field early next week, and the Indians are expected to sign the free agent first baseman to a one-year deal. Perez will report to Cleveland for a physical examination that will take place Tuesday, according to a team source. If all goes well, the deal, which might include an option for a second year, should be completed. "We've had serious discussions," general manager Mark Shapiro said. "We like the player and think he'd be a good complement to our club. It's not a done deal, but at this point we're optimistic." Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
